function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Increased risk of COVID-19 transmission in the workplace due to close interaction among workforce, design team, contractors, clients, stakeholders, and supply chain.","Impact":"Potential spread of the virus leading to illness, business disruption, and potential financial losses.","Mitigation":"Implement strict health and safety protocols, social distancing measures, and remote work policies.","Technologies":"Contact tracing apps, remote collaboration tools, and virtual meeting platforms.","People":"Workforce, design team, contractors, clients, stakeholders, supply chain employees.","Owner":"Employers, project managers, business owners."},{"Description":"Short-term cash flow issues due to economic lockdown and reduced business activities.","Impact":"Financial strain, inability to meet financial obligations, and potential business closure.","Mitigation":"Implement effective cash flow management, seek financial assistance, and explore cost-saving measures.","Technologies":"Financial management software, cash flow forecasting tools, and government relief programs.","People":"Business owners, finance teams, project managers.","Owner":"Finance departments, business owners."},{"Description":"Uncertainty in the business return plan due to evolving COVID-19 situation and economic consequences.","Impact":"Inability to scale business operations, delayed recovery, and prolonged financial instability.","Mitigation":"Develop flexible business recovery plans, monitor market trends, and diversify revenue streams.","Technologies":"Business continuity planning software, data analytics tools for market insights.","People":"Business executives, strategic planners, operations teams.","Owner":"Strategic planners, business leaders."}]}
